column4: has anyone had any x problems? like going to tty2 then back to 7 and the system crashes
that would be a video driver/hardware problem
older/less-supported video cards often have that sort of problem
also.. if i log out i get stuck at a black screen?
not sure about the log-out problem
Also I cannot switch back to tty2 Quinn_Storm
well, it sounds like it probably is a vid card/driver problem
if I modprobe fglrx Quinn_Storm and it doesnt say anything does that mean those drivers are loaded and im not in Vesa?
